document.full_text: washington became the first u.s. state to suspend its 2012 presidential primary election on thursday, a move signed into law by governor christine gregoire to save some $10 million from the state budget.
document.title: washington state suspends 2012 presidential primary
lines_and_colors: washington became the first u.s. state to suspend its 2012 presidential primary election on thursday, a move signed into law by governor christine gregoire to save some $10 million from the state budget.
